mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR (USER_ID, TITLE, START, END, START_TIME, END_TIME, CONTENTS) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{contents})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CALENDAR_SEQ, C.USER_ID, C.START, C.END, C.START_TIME, C.END_TIME, C.CONTENTS, C.TITLE FROM CALENDAR C WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.START BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY C.START_TIME, C.CALENDAR_SEQ

SELECT C.CALENDAR_SEQ, C.USER_ID, C.START, C.END, C.START_TIME, C.END_TIME, C.CONTENTS, C.TITLE FROM CALENDAR C WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.START = CURRENT_DATE() ORDER BY C.START_TIME, C.CALENDAR_SEQ
